line_1: There to expire; — but one who saw him hang
line_2: Cut the good cord — a traitor of the gang.

line_1: Mess, lad! tou deserves maist to hang!
line_2: Is this then thy fine Reets o' Man?

line_1: Here Sparta's sons in mute attention hang,
line_2: While sage Lycurgus pours the mild harangue;

line_1: That soul, which seems on you to hang
line_2: But oh! in every mortal pang
